Description: Four beads in different shapes and materials. A: Two disc-shaped beads made of turquoise faience, one is slightly larger than the other. B: One and a half beads in extended spherical shape, one made of transparent blue glass partly corroded in pearlescent colour, the broken one made of white and blue glass, less shiny and not transparent.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
